subject: Communication
title: Data Privacy: Your Digital Footprint
description: One-minute skill: Data Privacy: Your Digital Footprint.

hook.text: Every click, search, and like creates a data trail. Companies know your habits better than your closest friends.

buildup.text: Data brokers collect and sell personal profiles. Your digital footprint is bought and sold thousands of times yearly.

discovery.text: Cambridge Analytica used Facebook data from 87 million users to target political ads. Data became a weapon.

twist.text: GDPR gave Europeans data rights. But most people still click 'accept all cookies' without reading a single word.

climax.text: Media literacy now includes data literacy: understanding what you share, who collects it, and how it's used.

punchline.text: If the service is free, you're the product being sold.
